content.text:
# List of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in the Democratic Republic of the Congo

}}
This is a list of fossiliferous stratigraphic units in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
__NOTOC__
{| class="wikitable sortable"
|-
! Group !! Formation !! Period !! class="unsortable"| Notes
|-
| rowspan=2 | Albertine Group || Nyabusosi Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Gelasian || align=center |
|-
| Nyakabingo Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Piacenzian || align=center |
|-
| Semliki Group || Lusso Beds || style="background-color: ;" | Pliocene || align=center |
|-
| || Sinda Beds || style="background-color: ;" | Late Miocene-Pliocene || align=center |
|-
| || Landana Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Thanetian-Ypresian || align=center |
|-
| Lualaba Group ||  || style="background-color: ;" | Cenomanian || align=center |
|-
| Kwango Group ||  || style="background-color: ;" | Late Jurassic || align=center |
|-
| rowspan=2 | Upper Lukuga Group || Transition Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Kungurian || align=center |
|-
| Couches de houille Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Sakmarian-Artinskian || align=center |
|-
| rowspan=2 | Lower Lukuga Group || Schistes noires Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Asselian-Sakmarian || align=center |
|-
| Schistes noirs de Walikale Formation || style="background-color: ;" | Asselian || align=center |
|-
| Ecca Group || || style="background-color: ;" | Asselian || align=center |
|-
|}

References
Further reading
* R. Aoki. 1992. Fossil crocodilians from the late Tertiary strata in the Sinda Basin, eastern Zaire. African Study Monographs 17:67-85
* O. A. Hoeg and M.N. Bose. 1960. The Glossopteris flora of the Belgian Congo, with a note on some fossil plants from the Zambesi [sic] Basin (Mozambique). Annales du Musee Royal du Congo Belge 32:1-99
* A. K. Miller. 1951. Tertiary nautiloids of west-coastal Africa. Annales du Museé du Congo Belge Tervuren, Sciences Géologiques 8:1-88
* P. P. Pavlakis. 1990. Plio-Pleistocene Hippopotamidae from the Upper Semliki. Virginia Museum of Natural History Memoir 1:203-223
* P. Pruvost. 1934. Description d'un insecte fossile des couches de la Lukuga (Kivu). Memoires de l'Institut geologique de l'Universite de Louvain 9(4):1-8
* W. E. Swinton. 1948. A Cretaceous pterosaur from the Belgian Congo. Bulletin de la Société Belge de Géologie, de Paléontologie, et d'Hydrologie 57:234-238
